name: Drive Hard (itch)
description:
Here you are the driver. You are driving in the opposite lane at 300 km/h. Unleash your inner madman and try to make the highest score!

This game is 3D endless racing game. Sounds, materials, animations, 3d objects, camera movement and more is included in this project.

How to play: It's simple. Just use 'A' to go left and 'D' to go right.

Here's the gameplay video --> https://paply.org/drivehard
